title: Hataraku Maou-sama! High School N - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Demon Lord   Male Protagonist
author: Wagahara Satoshi   和ヶ原聡司
description:
A spin off of Hataraku Maou-sama! With the roles all changed, Maou's a high school student, Chiho's his classmate, Ashiya is a worker at MgRonald's!

After being defeated by the Hero, the Demon King flees to Tokyo, Sasazuka and leads a fulfilling school life. But one day, he's involved in an accident, and his identity is exposed to the former hero, Emi. Suspicious of his apparently irreproachable school life, Emi dons a school uniform and infiltrates the school, but—!>
